website_summaries.verdict: Something a little different from the average wicker hanging chair. The Flower House chair sits at a slightly lower price point without compromising quality.
pros: We loved the variety of bright colors available for this chair
The mesh, while quite airy, also felt strong – there was no fear of bottoming out
Weather-resistant fabric holds up when left outdoors
cons: Mesh fabric not as aesthetically pleasing as wicker competitors

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chair is wonderful. It swings,swivels,spins & is so comfortable. It's perfect for positive, calming sensory input & easily holds my 250 lb Autistic son. I had ordered this chair for me (and a rocking chair for him) but he loves it & wants to keep it! On the downside, it weighs a lot and is difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Teenage daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, easy to assemble in about 20-30 minutes. Very heavy coated steel frame, which is reassuring if you are going to be swinging around a bit. Egg shape seat taller and wider than expected which is great. Good for outdoors or in. Teenage daughter loves it. Got on offer at $120 on Amazon so worth shop around as I see them selling for up to $400.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: A heavy duty frame, but poorly made cushions doom this chair.
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair from Amazon and it was missing essential parts and instructions. A week later parts were delivered and the item installed reasonably well with two people. The chair itself is sturdy, but the cushions are a nightmare. One minor rainstorm later and the cushions were soaked through and acted as a sponge. I put the cushions in a dry area and two weeks later...still wet. I have finally dried them and now have to take them in and out of the elements in order to prevent the chair from becoming usuable. I will be coating the item in waterproofing shortly to see if that helps. Overall.....meh...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew RK

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these - I bought 2, this and a larger version. They're terribly uncomfortable as the pillows are too thing so the metal bars are driving in to you. Relatively easy to assemble - one of them, I can't remember if it was this or the larger one, was a complete pain and took 2 people as well as some leverage to manhandle the bars into appropriate shape. I bought 2, and regret it really. I'll replace them this year with something (hopefully) more comfortable - that shouldn't be difficult - a bed of nails probably fits that bill...
customer_reviews.author: That Vegetarian Guy

customer_reviews.title: My new throne!
customer_reviews.text: Oh! How i love this! So far, since my teenage son assembled my throne, it seems to be the best thing I've done for myself in years. Ordering another ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: TeaWithSu

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair and my 12 year old loves it but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair and my 12 year old loves it but it was extremely difficult to assemble and the fabrics was worn and dis colored near the metal mechanisms upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Weber

customer_reviews.title: I love this Egg!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating for weeks if I should buy this swing. I finally took the plunge and wish I wouldn't have waited so long. I have it inside with big furry pillows and throw. It's so cozy! If you have trouble sleeping, this will rock you into a happy nap. I am thinking about getting rid of all my furniture and replacing with swings!! I'm saving up for the double wide egg. Best part; dogs can't jump in unless I'm there to pick them up. They already took over my bed, but this egg is mine!
customer_reviews.author: AJA

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together (and I am assembly required challenged)! Sturdy enough, although mine is a tiny bit wobbly based on my statement above. Very few pieces to put together. The pins were a little hard to get in because you have to pull it really tight to get them in place but that is how it should be for sturdiness. Overall a great product at a great price! We haven’t really tested the limits but me and a couple kids fit it in it no problem! One of the reviews mentioned something about the size being child sized but that is ridiculous! We can basically fit our whole family in there!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great little egg chair!
customer_reviews.text: The paper directions were not the clearest in the world, but luckily their online video helped. Took my husband a quick minute to assemble due to that and one leg was a bit shaky for some reason. Otherwise I am very happy with It! Seems sturdy, swings nicely and it has a nice amount of sitting/laying space. I’d suggest a back pillow as leaning on the bars can become uncomfortable. I’m also surprised it came deliver in one piece, as the box weighed at least 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty excited when she gets done with having it in ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted a chair that swung from the ceiling in her bedroom. This was the compromise. She loves it. I'm pretty excited when she gets done with having it in her room we will be able to have it out on the patio for us all to enjoy! It does take up a fair amont of space though.
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Loosen ALL bolts before “slotting” all nuts and bolts
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that ALL screws should be loosened in order to complete the top and the bottom when assembling. Upon discovering that, the final couple steps ( with my husband’s strong hands) were pretty easy. I fell asleep in it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GAIL

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and nice to look at!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's bedroom and she LOVES it. She falls asleep in it and just hangs all day when she is home. It is a very nice chair. A little difficult to put together initially because the basket has to be fully open to screw together and that was a difficult process. Otherwise it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Very happy daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered today. My 12 year old was able to assemble almost the entire thing by herself, needing only help with the pins that go in the top to loop around the front bars, and someone stronger to make sure all the bolts were as right as possible. It is extremely cozy. I had to give it a try myself. Excellent construction, well built, high quality materials. She hasn't left the chair since she finished putting it together, about 4 hours ago.
customer_reviews.author: tchrmom

customer_reviews.title: Just a Swinging
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised about the weight and quality. It is just great. I would highly recommend it to anyone who has always wanted one, but found them to be to pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Comforting for spectrum kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the hanging nets and chairs at at the occupational therapy office, especially on stressful days, and this chair replicates that perfectly. He took to it immediately, really appreciates it in his room. It does take up a lot of space, so be sure you have somewhere appropriate to put it!
customer_reviews.author: ironfroggy

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my teenager put this chair in his room, and reads in it daily. great chair
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: This product looked like it was used!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this delivered this afternoon opened package and noticed all the styrofoam was broken .. it had to be defective...we struggled to put this together but the worst part was the scratches and slight tears in the back of the fabric .. I don’t know what to do because it took us forever to put together.. total disappointment .. can’t review comfort because we haven’t even sat in it ... saw the defects and wrote this review
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bamboo...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this mesh chair instead of the bamboo thinking it would be more comfortable for in the home... And it was! I will have to add more padding for long-term sitting because of the bars underneath the mesh... But my mother tried it out and went to sleep within 10 minutes and she doesn't really like anything new sooo🤸 I put it together by myself and struggled with the egg part of it but I used a small screwdriver and the third hole as I was putting the screw in the fourth hole and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: NY Tee

customer_reviews.title: MISSING HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: Last time i wrote a review amazon deleted it because i stated how deceitful the camponee (misspelled on purpose) was when i attempted to have the hardware mailed to me or have the chair replaced... they basically told me i was s.o.l...
customer_reviews.author: CynCee

customer_reviews.title: Swivels and swings
customer_reviews.text: We love our swing, it’s perfect for hanging out for the kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Shera

customer_reviews.title: Great reading chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday surprise for my daughter. She loves her new reading chair. It's bigger than I thought it would be. My husband put it together in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Blueduck516

customer_reviews.title: looks great on my deck!
customer_reviews.text: Got the chair on time and my son put it together in short time. The parts seem really well made and were easy to put together. It is very sturdy --my 260# son sat in and no problem! My only complaint (not) is I am short so the bottom bar cuts my knee -- pillow will help that! thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: pogo

customer_reviews.title: The chair is really really cool. It holds up
customer_reviews.text: The chair is really really cool. It holds up. I'm still getting use to it. I'm usually scared everything i sit on will break. But yea it's fun. And it was actually really easy to put together. The only thing I'd say is have some comfy pillows for it.ita kinda hard
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Did not come as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair but it’s not what is pictured, instead of a spring to hold it up mine is a seatbelt strap which hangs the chair in only one position, you can rotate but it spins you back to the same position, the spring is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faces to the Side of Frame and Not Front - Not Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Looks Nice - Feels Good - Built well - Decent Price One complaint - the chair does not face the front - or allow for adjustment
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love these chair. Couldn't get them outside until brought these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl crump

customer_reviews.title: Love Our Chair
customer_reviews.text: Flower House Egg Chair is great. Found it easy to assemble quickly. It sits outside near our koi pond. Added an extra pillow for looks and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t even come with the chain attachment at the top. It’s worthless now. What a waste of money!!!!!! Legs also wiggle. Didn’t come with the same pads inside like the pic either
customer_reviews.author: Christina ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandson with Autism. The only ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson with Autism. The only complaint is that the rubber stops do not really keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it and so do I. We use it out on the patio, so far no rust. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: PWilson

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: Color was right, but the chair is ok. Wish it would have been the color we ordered 😔
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than what the cost of the chair
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat hesatin about purchasing this chair because of the price you know the old saying you get what you pay for well not the case here this chair is one of the best purchase I have made in a long time a little difficult to put together but worth more than what it cost fantastic but
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter's room, and the only complaint that I could possibly have about it is that it is a little too large for the space, but that's my fault. This chair is made to last - strong materials, very heavy, and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Just a quick question it creaks
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just a quick question it creaks. How do you make it stop. I know it's medal on medal but there must be a way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Egg Chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 11 year old Grandson. He loves it. He sits in it every day if the rest of the family is not in it and reads his favorite books. Very satisfied with the product and it arrived timely. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Chair
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old wanted this for Christmas, let me just say it is now the most sought after chair in the house. My 16yr old has now added this to his Birthday list. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Leah Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves these chairs! We're getting an extra pillow to add more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: June A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and a great tension reliever. All the family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made chair could use a little more padding but other wise very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife and since we brought it to florida my wife sits in it and reads for hours. She loves it and says it is the most comfortable chair she has ever had
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, the assembly is somewhat difficult because of the black and white instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: EASY ASSEMBLY AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed the egg chair and feel the quality construction will last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bush

customer_reviews.title: Won’t tip
customer_reviews.text: This swing chair is very sturdy. The extra legs at the bottom make it so you never worry about tipping. It sits back very deep so you can curl up in it if you want. My 5’5” daughter has it in her room and she will lay on her side and curl up and nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Valor

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: THE Best Buy for my 9 year old. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping, arrived just as stated
customer_reviews.text: Great shipping, arrived just as stated. Pretty easy to put together. There are a couple of hitch pins that we had to work on for a little extra time, but not a big deal once we figured out how to hold it down. Seems to be well built and saved nearly $100 by buying online as opposed to buying in the store where we first saw it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my college age daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my college age daughter. She loves it but had difficulty assembling it herself. She bought an extra pillow to add inside.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to assemble alone but worth the effort and price. Very confy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Charm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter and the smiles have not stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Finnegan’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair - it is so relaxing and very sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good and sturdy product. Took about 30 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair hammock.
customer_reviews.text: We love this hammock chair! We bought one from a store and the kids fight over it so found this same exact one on Amazon and it was easy to put together and very sturdy. Color is true to picture. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Spanton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be very well made. Large enough for my wife and daughter to cuddle up in!!
customer_reviews.author: hans

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Padding could be thicker.. would make the chair more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this chair for her room. It's the perfect size. We can both fit in it, so I'm not sure why people are saying it's too small. It is comfortable and fun to sit in. We wired hers with lights and extra pillows. Very nice chair, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey pinkham

product_meta.title: Flower House FHEC100-BRK Egg Chair, Bark
product_meta.description: Color:BarkThe Flowerhouse FHEC100-BRK Egg Chair in Bark offers a beautiful place to relax in your home and garden. It's engineered with a durable, weather-resistant fabric, making it a perfect addition to an indoor or outdoor seating area. The overall height of the chair on the stand measures 66-Inch tall, while the opening to the egg seat measures 35-Inch wide and 43-Inch high. The chair cushion measures 28-Inch wide by 24-Inch deep.
feature_bullets: Makes a great addition to your home and garden
Available in a variety of colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
